user_message: Which method is used to perform a simulation step in PyChrono? 'A. sys.Step()', 'B. sys.DoStep()', 'C. sys.DoStepDynamics()', 'D. sys.RunStep()'
model_2_response: In PyChrono, the method used to perform a simulation step is **C. sys.DoStepDynamics()**. This method advances the simulation by one time step, updating the state of the system based on the dynamics.
